Text: Anyone else having problems with the video locking up at a couple points?

good to know I'm not the only one that the video seems having trouble catching up with The Flash. hope a proper comes out soon...
why doesnt anybody release a good xvid copy for this show, im not talking about this week..... its missed out every week
